article_title: Blue Cross: NC’s Affordable Care Act rates will rise 13.5% on average
article_text: Blue Cross and Blue Shield, the state’s biggest health insurer, said Wednesday that rates under the Affordable Care Act next year will increase by 13.5 percent on average, but some residents would see much larger increases.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Blue Cross and Blue Shield, North Carolina, Affordable Care Act, Obamacare, rates, health insurance, renewal notice
